PPBUS_G3H- .28V
diode ppbus G3H to ground - .225V

First bad readings at ISL, replaced got current values, had short on PPBUS_G3H at q7035 that appeared later on working on things, replaced q7035/30 and u7000 one more time.  Values at ISL still same and still no PPBUS G3H

title: 820-3115 no PPBUS_G3H
message:
0.225 on L7030 is not good, if Q7035 is original; check diode mode inverting probes too.

Remove F7040 and check voltage at L7030.

title: 820-3115 no PPBUS_G3H
message:
no longer original q7035.

voltage at L7030 is 1V with F7040 removed.

title: 820-3115 no PPBUS_G3H
message:
Check again diode mode with F7040 removed.
You should get 0.400-500 at L7030, with red probe on ground; OL with black on ground.

title: 820-3115 no PPBUS_G3H
message: .518V red to ground and yes OL w/ black to ground

title: 820-3115 no PPBUS_G3H
message:
Replace R/C7025.
Check all traces and solders around U7000.
